info.title: Guardian Content API
info.description: The Content API is a public service for accessing all the content the Guardian creates and the collections we have of that content (tags and sections). There are over one and a half million items available published as far back as 1999. This overview will give you some idea of what data is available, how to find what you need, and what you will see when you make a request to us.

parameters.name: api-key
parameters.description: The API key used for the query

parameters.name: callback
parameters.description: The javascript callback name to wrap the JSON response

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: The format to return the results in

parameters.name: hide-recent-content
parameters.description: When true removes the results list from the response.

parameters.name: idea
parameters.description: The ID for an item, such as a piece of content, is the path to that item on the site. By replacing the domain with content.guardianapis.com you get the API URL for that piece of content

parameters.name: show-editors-picks
parameters.description: When true display a list of content that is chosen by editors on tags, sections and the home page. This content list represents the main list of content found on the equivalent path on the site

parameters.name: show-most-viewed
parameters.description: When true display most viewed content. For overall most viewed set id to /, for section most viewed set id to the section id

parameters.name: show-related-content
parameters.description: Content items can show a set of related content. When true returns content items related to the main content item

parameters.name: show-story-package
parameters.description: When true display a list of content that is in the has been identified as being about the same story as the requested content item. When a content item is in a package the hasStoryPackage field has a value of true

parameters.name: api-key
parameters.description: The API key used for the query

parameters.name: callback
parameters.description: The javascript callback name to wrap the JSON response. Read HTTP Status Codes and APIs: how the Guardians Content API does it for more details

parameters.name: commentCloseDate
parameters.description: The date the comments have been closed

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: The format to return the results in

parameters.name: from-date
parameters.description: Return only content published on or after that date

parameters.name: ids
parameters.description: Return only content with those IDs

parameters.name: liveBloggingNow
parameters.description: Content is currently live blogged if true

parameters.name: order-by
parameters.description: Returns results in the specified order

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Return only the result set from a particular page

parameters.name: page-size
parameters.description: Modify the number of items displayed per page

parameters.name: production-office
parameters.description: Return only content from those production offices

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Request content containing this free text

parameters.name: reference
parameters.description: Return only content with those references

parameters.name: reference-type
parameters.description: Return only content with references of those types

parameters.name: rights
parameters.description: Return only content with those rights

parameters.name: section
parameters.description: Return only content in those sections

parameters.name: shouldHideAdverts
parameters.description: Adverts will not be displayed if true

parameters.name: show-elements
parameters.description: Add associated media elements such as images and audio

parameters.name: show-fields
parameters.description: Add fields associated with the content

parameters.name: show-references
parameters.description: Add associated reference data such as ISBNs

parameters.name: show-rights
parameters.description: Add associated rights

parameters.name: showInRelatedContent
parameters.description: Whether this content can appear in automatically generated Related Content

parameters.name: tag
parameters.description: Return only content with those tags

parameters.name: to-date
parameters.description: Return only content published on or before that date

parameters.name: use-date
parameters.description: Changes which type of date is used to order the results

parameters.name: api-key
parameters.description: The API key used for the query

parameters.name: callback
parameters.description: The javascript callback name to wrap the JSON response.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: The format to return the results in

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Return section based on the query term specified

parameters.name: api-key
parameters.description: The API key used for the query

parameters.name: callback
parameters.description: The javascript callback name to wrap the JSON response. Read HTTP Status Codes and APIs: how the Guardians Content API does it for more details

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: The format to return the results in

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Returns results only for that page index

parameters.name: page-size
parameters.description: Modify the number of items displayed per page

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Request tags containing this free text

parameters.name: reference
parameters.description: Return only tags with those references

parameters.name: reference-type
parameters.description: Return only tags with references of those types

parameters.name: section
parameters.description: Return only tags in those sections

parameters.name: show-references
parameters.description: Show associated reference data such as ISBNs

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Return only tags of those types
